kesewethath, mahathwu parishramayaka prathipalayak lesa adata yogya paridi prathishodhitha sthawara niyogawala awasana ketumpath pitapatha salaka bala ada dina parlimenthuwa wisin sammatha kirimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam kara thibunada, ema wadagath karyaya nawatha warak 2018 pebarawari masa 19 wani sandudata kal damimata siduwiya.
uthure palanaya sarthaka wanne madhyama aanduwa samaga sahayogayen kriya kirimen bawada apage awabodhayayi.
ehi prathipalaya wune "ro" sanwidhanaye meheyawimen demala sannaddha kalli thanu indiyawa je.aarta pamanak nowa awu 30k pura mulu lankawatama madi nokiyanna salakimayi.
